description: My place is close to central park, MET Museum, Mt Sinai Hospital, few steps from 6 Train station, Guggenheim museum. NYC museum., The Lexington Social. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the kitchen, the views, and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Nicest studio near Central Park and the 6 train
review: Cesar's studio is well located within walking distance of Central Park and the subway station (103st/Lex). The description is very accurate and the check-in process was very easy.
